video_prompt: Miniature figures in red and blue suits with yellow hard hats actively work, hammering and moving around the base of a towering, icy blue mask. Wisps of snow particles drift and swirl in the air.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** A towering, translucent icy blue tribal mask with jagged ice shards atop, set in a snowy landscape. Miniature construction workers in red/blue safety suits and yellow hard hats interact with the mask's base. Floating white flakes, soft gray background. Highly detailed, surreal, monumental.
refined_video_prompt: Figures actively hammer and continuously move, their actions defining a distinct, circular trajectory. Snow particles drift and swirl dynamically, generating persistent atmospheric changes.
